name: Gnoll Pack Leader
description: The Gnoll Pack Leader is a Medium humanoid with a fierce demeanor and a tactical edge, wielding a spear and employing aggressive maneuvers in combat.
memorable: The highlight of the Gnoll Pack Leader is its ability to enhance its allies through Pack Tactics and the Chilling Laughter ability, enabling strategic group attacks.
goals: The Gnoll Pack Leader typically leads hunting parties, coordinating attacks against prey.
relations: Gnoll Packs, other gnolls, and potential human or humanoid slaves.
environment: Commonly found in caves, forests, or grasslands where gnoll tribes dwell.
strengths: Capitalizes on teamwork and squad tactics, making it significantly more dangerous when in the company of allies.
weaknesses: Has a low Wisdom score, making it less perceptive and insightful in critical situations.
attacks: Utilizes a spear for melee or ranged attacks and can strike twice per turn under its Multiattack feature, dealing piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Chilling Laughter allows the Pack Leader to incite frenzy among its allies, enabling additional attacks against their foes.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing it to see in dim light and darkness.
additional_information: Can use Pack Tactics for advantageous attacks when allies are nearby.
Ability to perform a Rampaging Bite as a bonus action against bloodied foes.
Rechargeable Chilling Laughter ability that amplifies its allies' attacks.
Moderate Armor Class and hit points make it resilient in battle.
Low passive perception indicates struggles with awareness.
